title: IS_DISABLED_RAW_KEY_PRESSED
content:
0x1F7CBBAA// IsDisabledRawKeyPressed
BOOL IS_DISABLED_RAW_KEY_PRESSED(int rawKeyIndex);Parameters:rawKeyIndex: Index of raw key from keyboard.Returns: Returns bool value of pressed state.Gets if the specified rawKeyIndex is pressed, even if the key is disabled with DISABLE_RAW_KEY_THIS_FRAME.Virtual key codes can be found hereExamples:Luaif IsDisabledRawKeyPressed(32) then -- KEY_SPACE
    print("Spacebar pressed")
end
